price: Na hakika tuliwatia adhabu kali; lakini hawakuelekea kwa Mola wao Mlezi wala hawakunyenyekea.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسۡتَكَانُواْ لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
footnotes: Na Sisi kwa hakika tuliwapa adhabu kama kwa kuwauwa au kuwaletea njaa. Na wala hawakumnyenyekea Mola wao Mlezi, bali waliendelea na jeuri zao na kiburi chao kiasi ya kuondoka tu hiyo adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad akhadhnāhum bil-ʿadhābi famā is'takānū lirabbihim wamā yataḍarraʿūna
